name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Belinda WILSON, Petitioner

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Belinda WILSON, Petitioner.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 26th day of January, 1996, the Petition for Alowance of Appeal is GRANTED, limited to the issues of (1) whether the victims’ prior inconsistent statements were admissible as contemporaneous, verbatim recordings under Commonwealth v. Lively, 530 Pa. 464, 610 A.2d 7 (1992); and (2) whether trial counsel was ineffective for failing to object to hearsay testimony.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
670 A.2d 640
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Respondent, v. Belinda WILSON, Petitioner.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 26, 1996.
